title: Nexus 4 screen cracked. Can't access. Can I still transfer all my data and info to new Pixel 3A
content: Just purchased new google Pixel 3A . Getting ready to transfer data from old Nexus 4 phone. Problem is I dropped old phone and cracked the screen. I cannot get into old phone now. Is there a way to transfer all the data from the old to the new without being able to access my old phone?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
